name: BATTLE SURVIVE HORROR
description:
BETRAYAL OR MADNESS ?

********************************************************************************

Links to the downloads can be found at the bottom of the page

Version Française du jeu (French version)
 =>https://lessdessdouxstudio.itch.io/battle-survive-horreur <=

********************************************************************************

SYNOPSIS

Discover the two nations of the universe that are the people of the Heavens and the people of the Earth that both shelter heavy secrets more terrifying than the others. 

Go on an adventure in this story mixing book and rpg game by embodying the two protagonists of the game, one celestial and the other terrestrial.

With the hero from Earth, you will witness the ruthless and barbaric cruelty of the people living in the clouds, but it is at the sight of the last victim that your anger will explode. 

Indeed, the loss of your beloved to the clutches of the enemy will be the source of the desire for revenge that will drive you. 

Into despair, this strange being will appear, who will be able to help you bring back your lover by succeeding in the mission he will entrust to you. 

So, without wasting a minute, you will embark on an incredible and horrifying adventure through the skies and its people, against whom you will have to fight to succeed.

Playing with the hero of the skies, you will be a resident who has lived by the wisest words of the great Spiritual Leader, the most respected being of the people who will constantly warn you about the dangers of the people of the lower world. 

But you will soon discover the vile actions of the dear Spiritual Leader. 

In turn, you will get to know this mist that will warn you about the misdeeds of the most responsible of the people. 

Between dreams and reality, you will have to make a choice.

To trust the Spiritual Leader or to distance yourself from him...

And what are the dangers of the Earth ? 

While playing, you will meet surprising, mysterious, idealistic characters and many others.

Fighting, action, adventure, survival, role-playing, rpg, game in the form of interactive stories, between magic, fantasy and fantastic is what awaits you through Battle Survive: Horror.

Is it a horror story or an open world and exploration story ? 

The choice is yours !
